name: Rival's Path: Lich
description:
Top-down magic shooter.

Start your journey to be a powerful lich and vanquish your foes on the way.

This is a Demo version and game is still in development.

Feel free to give feedback :)

Donations are also welcome if you like the game as i'm aiming to release the game free or low-cost at least.

I hope you have fun. ^^
